text: Marcos Antonio Milinković (born December 22, 1971 in Villa Ballester, Buenos Aires) is an Argentine volleyball player. Milinković is 203 cm and weighs 100 kg. He competed in the 1996, 2000 and 2004 Summer Olympics. ==Other websites== * FIVB 2007 Profile * Milinkovic Profile at ESPN * Italian League Profile * Interview in volley country Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:1996 Summer Olympics Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Argentina Category:Argentine volleyball players
title: Marcos Milinkovic
